title: "Boffins build regenerating soft robot"
excerpt: "Doctor who can heal itself  Boffins at Cornell University have developed an autonomous, soft robot that is not only able to identify injuries but heal itself. The scientists plan to integrate these soft robots with artificial intelligence (AI) machine learning in the future."
